Answers.MP Summary: apply a diff file to an original
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Apply a patch using a diff file (filenames must be included in the diff file)
Top-3 Similar Questions: so_4215722: Difference between patch and diff files
au_175236: Ubuntu - Patch Diff merge issue
Top-3 Scripts:
au_175236: patch -o test.txt < test.patch

patch -R test.txt < test.patch

Explanations about Options.-R:
Assume that this patch was created with the old and new files swapped. (Yes, I'm
 afraid that does happen occasionally, human nature being what it is.) patch attempts
 to swap each hunk around before applying it. Rejects come out in the swapped format.
 The -R option does not work with ed diff scripts because there is too little
 information to reconstruct the reverse operation.
